column1: Drink

Drink
Drink
Select two playes to drink
Flip a coin. Heads, each player drinks once. Tails, you drink once for each other player.
Drink a shot
Choose any two players to arm wrestle. Loser drinks once
Drink twice for each female player
A player of your choosing must drink twice. The players sitting to his left and right must each drink once
A player of your choice must run 3 laps around the room
Loudly moan with pleasure
Pick a player to play rock paper scissors with. Loser drinks once. For each tie, everyone except you must drink
Do push-ups. For each 10 push-ups you do, everyone other than you must drink. When you're finished, you must drink
Choose a player. He must drink a shot using only his mouth. If he spills any, he must take a drink
Choose two players. Designate player A to do a body shot off player B
Pick a player. He must stick his arms out and stand on one foot with one eye closed for 10 seconds. If he fails, he must drink. If he succeeds, everyone else drinks twice
Everyone stands upright. You spin around once and drink once. The player to your left spins arount twice and drinks twice and so on
Choose a player and try to guess their underwear color. If this color appears anywhere on their underwear, they drink twice; otherwise, you drink once
Choose a player. He must take a shot, then fall off his chair
Select a player he/she must lift a player of their choice onto their shoulders. If they can't keep it up for 15 seconds, they must each drink. Otherwise, all other players must drink
Each turn, you choose someone to drink once. Ends after 6 turns
This player drinks double the normally required amount for the next 4 turns
Each time you drink all other playes must drink. Ends after 6 turns
Each time you drink, each other player must touch his thumb to a flat surface. The last to do so must drink. Ends after 5 rounds
You must play with your dominant arm behind your back. If you use it you drink. Ends after 6 turns
You must move, talk and drink in slow-motion for the next 4 turns
Select two players. Theys must each drink twice, then high-five
You choose a nickname. Anyone caught referring to you by your real name must drink
Waterfall
Question Master
Select a player to flip a coin until he gets two 'heads' in a row. For each 'tails', he must drink
You must walk around in a silly manner. Everyone else drinks
You have 5 seconds to draw a spider with a smiley and the correct amound of legs. If you succeed, everyone else must drink; if you fail you must drink once for each other player
Choose a player. Up to 3 others may each put an ice cube into this player's clothing
Everyone spanks you
Select two players to have a stairing contest. Loser drinks twice
Choose a player to make out with/hump a poster, object, or wall for at least 15 seconds
You must balance a coin on your nose. Anytime it falls of, must drink. Ends after 3 turns
Choose two players to dance sensually and slowly to any song
You must drink twice for each male player
You may not call anyone by their real name if you do drink
Choose a player to try to toss something into a glass 2m away. If they make it, everyone drinks. If they miss, they drink once for each other player
Order a pizza. If you don't want to you are not drunk enough drink 5 sips.
Drink a sip for every month we are away from january
You are the Holy Grail. Every time you drink at least one person needs to say 'Deus vult'. If nobody says it everyone expect you must drink
Choose a player to ask a embarrassing question. If the player does not answer the question he/she must drink 10 sips
Try to run through a wall
Give every player a hug
The player two players to your left has to bite your lips tenderly
Let soemone throw a glass of water on your face
Bark at the moon
Get a nipple twist
Give a bottle a blowjob
Take off two pieces of clothing
Do a forward roll
Suck the thumb of the person on your right
Drink three sips and distribute three sips
Write your name one a wall using your ass
Strip one piece of clothing
Pick a player who has to strip one piece of clothing
The player to your right has to squeeze your tits or you could take a shot
Person on your left chugs your glass

Everone drinks exept you
